title: Probability-generating functions
dot:
digraph ProbabilityGeneratingFunctions{node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightgrey];Introduction[label="Introduction
- Struggling with PGFs
- Two missing puzzle pieces
- Curious about PGFs or characteristic functions", width=2];Sequences[label="Sequences of Numbers without Vectors
- Example with playing cards
- Probabilities as vectors
- Transition to polynomials", width=2];GeneratingFunctions[label="Polynomials Encoding Sequences
- Function f(x) = 6 + 2x + 8x^2 + 4x^3
- Polynomials capture sequences
- Extraction through calculus", width=2];ProbabilityGenerating[label="Probability-Generating Functions
- Example with card draw probabilities
- G(t) = (1/5)t^1 + (1/5)t^7 + (1/5)t^9 + (2/5)t^12", width=2];CoinFlips[label="Coin Flips and PGFs
- Fair coin: G(t) = 0.5t^0 + 0.5t^1
- Biased coin: G(t) = (1-p) + pt", width=2];GeometricDist[label="Geometric Distribution
- Sequence of probabilities for heads
- Infinite series handling
- Compact notation: G(t) = p / [1 - (1 - p)t]", width=2];Properties[label="Properties of PGFs
- Summing coefficients (G(1) = 1)
- Expectation (G'(1))
- Variance related (G''(1))
- Convolution of distributions", width=2];CharFunction[label="Probability-Generating Function to Characteristic Function
- Use of t = e^(iu)
- Convergence for |t| <= 1
- Representation as φ(u)", width=2];Visualization[label="Visualizing the Characteristic Function
- Spiral around the unit circle
- Barycentre calculation", width=2];Conclusion[label="Conclusion
- Definitions are easy, consequences are complex", width=2];Introduction->Sequences;Sequences->GeneratingFunctions;GeneratingFunctions->ProbabilityGenerating;ProbabilityGenerating->CoinFlips;CoinFlips->GeometricDist;GeometricDist->Properties;Properties->CharFunction;CharFunction->Visualization;Visualization->Conclusion;}
